p: α-Glucosidase activity was evaluated in the small intestine. Small intestine homogenates (15 μL) were prepared in 0.1 M phosphate buffer (pH 6.9), and added to 15 μL of 3 mM GSH and 445 μL of 0.1 M phosphate buffer (pH 6.9), and incubated (37°C/10 min). Then, 40 μL of 5 mM p-nitrophenyl-α-D-glucopyranoside solution in 0.1 M phosphate buffer (pH 6.9) was added to the mixture and the mixture was incubated at 37°C for 10 min. Sodium carbonate (2 mL) was then added and the absorbance was measured at 405 nm. Total protein content of the enzyme solution was determined according to Lowry et al. (1951).
